  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/4203</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/4203</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Llegir molt empitjora la visió?</string>
            <string language="en">Does reading a lot spoil your eyesight?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verdirbt Messwert viel Ihr Sehvermögen?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La lecture abîme-t-elle beaucoup votre vue ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A leitura spoil muito seu eyesight?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La lettura mólto rovina la vostra vista?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ανάγνωση πολλή χαλά την όρασή σας;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) sobre les precaucions que cal tenir a fi d'evitar pèrdues de visió com a conseqüència dels mals hàbits visuals. Conté un enllaç extern amb informació sobre el tema.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) on the precautions to be taken to avoid spoiling one's eyesight due to bad reading habits. It includes an external link to information on the subject.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">òptica</string>
            <string language="en">optics</string>
            <string language="es">óptica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">discapacitat física</string>
            <string language="en">physical disability</string>
            <string language="es">discapacidad física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">prevenció</string>
            <string language="en">prevention</string>
            <string language="es">prevención</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">lectura</string>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
            <string language="es">lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">tècniques de lectura</string>
            <string language="en">reading strategies</string>
            <string language="es">técnicas de lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und antworten Sie (GLEICHHEIT) auf den, um 
irgendjemandes Sehvermögen wegen der, Lesefehlergewohnheiten zu 
verderben zu vermeiden genommen zu werden Vorkehrungen. Er 
schließt ein externes Link zu den Informationen über das Thema ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interrogez et répondez (PAIR) sur les précautions à 
prendre pour éviter d'abîmer sa vue due aux habitudes de mauvaise 
lecture. Elle inclut un lien externe à l'information sur le 
sujet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda (PAR) nas precauções a ser feitas 
exame para evitar de spoiling one's eyesight  devido aos hábitos da 
leitura incorreta. Inclui uma ligação externa à informação 
no assunto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a (PAR) sulle precauzioni da prendere 
per evitare di rovinare la sua vista dovuto le abitudini della lettura
incorretta. Include un collegamento esterno alle informazioni 
sull'oggetto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) στις συνήθειες στις 
προφυλάξεις που λαμβάνονται για να αποφύγει την όρασή κάποιου 
λόγω κακής ανάγνωσης. Περιλαμβάνει μια εξωτερική σύνδεση 
με τις πληροφορίες για το θέμα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">körperliche Unfähigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verhinderung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messwert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
